metadata.title: CVE-2020-36150 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Incorrect handling of input data in loudness function in the libmysofa library 0.5 - 1.1 will lead to heap buffer overflow and access to unallocated memory block.

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
